summary: Brussels is the capital of Belgium and an important city in Europe. It is officially bilingual, with French and Dutch being spoken, but many other languages are also used. The city has a rich history and is known for its delicious food, like waffles and chocolate. It is home to many international organizations, including the European Union's main offices. Brussels is densely populated and has a large metropolitan area. It's also a major transportation hub with a large airport and railway station. The city boasts beautiful architecture and landmarks, some of which are UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
title: Brussels
